about_the_game:
A Turn Based Strategy, with a world to explore and influence.

You play as a California Sheriff looking for his missing wife. Along the way you'll meet the different factions that inhabit the area. Will you be able to convince the Americans, Cowboys, Papago, and Apache to come together in times of need?



  • Story: Explore the Old West on the cusp of modernity. Each faction knows a change is coming to the fragile landscape, but few of them know the kinds of powers at play in the background
  • Open World: Run, Trap, Lure and Stealth past obstacles you'd rather avoid. The West was, and is, a wild expanse that can't be tamed. It's yours to explore.
  • Party Based Combat: You are limited to 5 creatures on your team. They are more powerful and reliable than bullets, so let their unique powers, abilities, and moves guide you on your journey.
  • Explore during day and night
